useCase.name: Update Dynamic Map
useCase.description: Update dynamic map in real time

preconditions.precondition: The application has access to the dynamic map data

mainSequence.step: The actor triggers the adc-dynamic-update() function from the command line interface (CLI)
CLI calls the dynamic/update() method internally to update the dynamic map in the system
The actor sends a dynamic update request to the Web interface
The Web interface forwards the update request to the system
